## Overview

The sensor network project involves deploying environmental monitoring sensors throughout the Nature Discovery Garden to collect real-time data on various environmental parameters.

## Objectives

- Monitor environmental conditions continuously
- Collect data on temperature, humidity, air quality, and other parameters
- Provide data for research and public engagement
- Support evidence-based garden management decisions
